title: Krest Digital & Fintech
titleHome: We build solutions for the web.
desc: We are specialized in design and conception of digital solutions.
aboutTxt1: Hi, we're Krest Digital & Fintech, and we love creating both designs and applications for the web. We've been around for over 4 years.
aboutTxt2: Over the years, we've created a wide range of solutions for companies and individuals, including websites and web applications.
aboutTxt3: Here are some of the technologies and tools we work with :
job1El1: Developed, maintained and shipped company's websites using WordPress
job2El1: Developed and styled interactive web applications for Danol using Angular and Bootstrap
job3El1: Developed and styled a web application for a client using Angular
job3El2: Collaborated with team to build the architecture for a large web application
job4El1: Implemented a CI chain with Jenkins
project1: This project is a React web application for the website of a higher institute.
project2: Template website for a company which deliver food from restaurants.
project3: Business website for a company that offer electronic security services.
projectMu: Mutual insurance application for Orange employees
projectPre: Website created for the company Premium Financial Consulting
projectTou: Application enabling individuals to create and collect money for tontines
projectNua: Pan-African Fin Tech company specializing in innovative and state-of-the-art cross-border and DeFi payment solution
projectKuandaa: Platform that brings together players in the event sector
projectAfricaMoney: International money transfer platform, specializing in secure and instant sending of funds to mobile wallets in Africa via Visa or Mastercard, in complete security.
projectSaga: Restaurant website with integrated reservation and home delivery services
projectLeCarino: Website for the restaurant Le Carino offering home delivery of its products.
contactContent: Got a project ? An Idea ? Feel free to contact me ! Our inbox is always open.
